name: Release The Beast
description:
Release the Beast was made by team JODAN for the UKIE 2018 Game Jam, where the theme of the Jam was "Change". After some back and forth we decided to make game about changing the emotional state of a creature so that it'll perform tasks. 

The goal of the game is to make the Groobus as angry as possible (tip: He doesn't like heavy metal :p) 

Lovingly crafted by

Jack Hutchines - Programming Wizard

Portfolio: https://hutchinesportfolio.wordpress.com/
